Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.common

Class CommonGoalCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.common.CommonGoalCard
Direct Known Subclasses:
CheckPattern, FiveXTiles, FullColumns, FullRows, NadiacentElements, NequalsSquares, NsameTiles
public abstract class CommonGoalCard extends Object
CommonGoalCard is an abstract class used to represent the common cards of the game.

  • Constructor Details

    • CommonGoalCard

      public CommonGoalCard(int nPlayers, String description) throws tooManyPlayersException
      The card constructor creates the card and assign the ScoringToken's stack based on the number of players
      Parameters:
      nPlayers - represents the numbers of players that are playing the game, necessary for the tokens to be assigned at the card
      description - it is used for explain the card's constraint
      Throws:
      tooManyPlayersException - when nPlayers exceed the numbers of the tile, tooManyPlayersException will be thrown

  • Method Details

    • popToken

      public ScoringToken popToken() throws EmptyStackException
      Make it possible to get the first ScoringToken on the stack, and remove it from the card
      Returns:
      the token point earned by the Player
      Throws:
      EmptyStackException - if all the tokenPoints have been distributed

    • verifyConstraint

      public boolean verifyConstraint(PlayerBookshelf bookshelf)
      verifyConstraint it is used to check if the player bookshelf given constraint
      Parameters:
      bookshelf - the player bookshelf to verify
      Returns:
      true, if the bookshelf passed the verification, false instead

      public String getDescription()
